jobs.seeker.welcome:
ğŸ” *Find a Job*

Tell me what kind of work you're looking for. You can just describe it naturally:

â€¢ Type of job (cleaning, delivery, construction, office work, etc.)
â€¢ Location (which area or city?)
â€¢ When you're available
â€¢ How much you expect to earn

For example: _"I need one-day work on Saturday in Kimironko, maybe as driver or loading stock, 10,000 RWF"_

Go ahead, type your message! ğŸ‘‡
jobs.poster.welcome:
ğŸ“ *Post a Job*

Tell me about the job you want to fill. Just describe it naturally in one message:

â€¢ What you need done
â€¢ Where (location)
â€¢ When (date/time)
â€¢ How much you'll pay
â€¢ Any requirements

For example: _"Need a waiter for Saturday evening event in Remera, 10,000 RWF for 4 hours, must speak English and French"_

Go ahead, describe your job! ğŸ‘‡
